mixed-citation.article-title: Hidden diversity within the Nemastoma bidentatum Roewer, 1914 complex (Opiliones: Nemastomatidae) Part I: Morphological evidence

tp:treatment-sec.p: Diagnosis (according to Gruber & Martens 1968 , slightly modified)

Genus of Nemastomatidae Simon, 1872 , with body length 1.5–2.5 mm , with scutum compositum; uniformly black or with silver or golden lateral spots. Pe with base perpendicular to dorso-ventrally flattened truncus, glans bilaterally symmetric or subsymmetric, without or with 1–8 pairs of lateral spines or denticles.
